snippet: Oil-rich, velvet-rope-poor Azerbaijan, a country about the size of South Carolina on the Caspian Sea, would very much like to be the world’s next party capital.
abstract: Peter Savodnik article on Azerbaijan, oil-rich country that is building what it hopes will be next party destination capital of the world; developer Ibrahim Ibrahimov, one of country's richest men, envisions sprawling development called Khazar Islands, with thousands of apartments, at least eight hotels, racetrack, yacht club, airport and the tallest building on earth.
lead_paragraph: Oil-rich, velvet-rope-poor Azerbaijan, a country about the size of South Carolina on the Caspian Sea, would very much like to be the world’s next party capital.

headline.seo: Azerbaijan Is Rich. Now It Wants to Be Famous.
headline.main: Azerbaijan Is Rich. Now It Wants to Be Famous.
headline.print_headline: If They Build It, Will The Kardashians Come?
